title: Added mapping versions, coupled enemies with their patrols, preparation for merging mapping with MythicDungeonTools

changes.change: The way pulls are saved and handled changed drastically - you should notice nothing of this but this was a major overhaul required to align mapping with MythicDungeonTools.
Enemies are now able to be linked with their patrols (will be active when Keystone.guru switches to use MythicDungeonTools mapping).
